formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AGI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Usage: SAY DATE <date> <escape digits> Say a given date, returning early if any of the given DTMF digits are received on the channel. <date> is number of seconds elapsed since 00:00:00 on January 1, 1970, Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). Returns 0 if playback completes without a digit being pressed, or the ASCII numerical value of the digit if one was pressed or -1 on error/hangup.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,3 +4,4 @@ on January 1, 1970, Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). Returns 0 if playback completes without a digit being pressed, or the ASCII numerical value of the digit if one was pressed or -1 on error/hangup. + Runs Dead : No
